title: Ep 156: The Best White Noise Machine To Buy
itunes:title: Ep 156: The Best White Noise Machine To Buy
itunes:subtitle: (When Your Therapist Abandons You)
description:
When your therapist abandons you to become an executive life coach for the rich and famous, what white noise machine do you buy while you’re trying to find your next shrink via Zoom?

 

Also, a collapsible tea kettle for on the road, which Sally is!

 

 

Mentioned on the show:

  • White Noise Machine: https://amzn.to/3fVlFdt 
  • Collapsible Tea Kettle: https://amzn.to/3rI1oKV
